title: Vanilla Ice Cream Soda Recipe
full_text:
Vanilla Ice Cream Soda Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
tablespoon
vanilla bean syrup
(or to taste)
1/4
cup
whole milk
1/4
cup
homemade or best quality store bought
vanilla ice cream
1/2 to 1
cup
seltzer
Directions
In a tall glass, add vanilla syrup and milk and use a long spoon to mix together thoroughly. Top with several scoops of ice cream and 1/2 to 1 cup of seltzer depending on the capacity of your glass. Serve immediately.
Special Equipment
Large glass, long spoon
